by.epamtr.totalizator.service

Interface ClientOperationService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientOperation

    public interface ClientOperationService
    Interface contains methods that are required to provide user's work with application.
    Author:
    Andrey Kryshtapovich

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GameCupoun getOpenedGame()
      Gets all information about currently opened game coupon in the system (status - Opened).
      boolean makeBet(MakeBetDTO makeBetDTO, byte[] creditCardNumber)
      Creates a bet of the particular user in the system.

    • Method Detail

      • registrationUser

        boolean registrationUser(UserDTO userDTO,
                         byte[] password,
                         byte[] repPassword)
                  throws ServiceException
        Creates a new user in the system with role "user".
        Parameters:
        userDTO - UserDTO object representing new user with all information about him.
        password - user's password for encrypting.
        repPassword - user's repeated password needed to confirm his password in the system.
        Returns:
        true if new user registered successfully. false if validation or DAO method fails.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if registration fails.

      • showEvents

        java.util.List<Event> showEvents(int gameCouponId)
                          throws ServiceException
        Gets all the information about events which are available for betting at the moment. Prepare the information for displaying.
        Parameters:
        gameCouponId - Id of currently Opened game coupon in the system.
        Returns:
        List of the Event object.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if obtaining information fails.

      • getOpenedGame

        GameCupoun getOpenedGame()
                  throws ServiceException
        Gets all information about currently opened game coupon in the system (status - Opened).
        Returns:
        GameCupoun object.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if obtaining information fails.

      • makeBet

        boolean makeBet(MakeBetDTO makeBetDTO,
                byte[] creditCardNumber)
         throws ServiceException
        Creates a bet of the particular user in the system. Provides encryption of the credit card user's number.
        Parameters:
        makeBetDTO - MakeBetDTO object.
        creditCardNumber - user's credit card number.
        Returns:
        true if new bet registered successfully. false if validation or DAO method fails.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if bet registration fails.
